name: Pre-roll Pop Tops
description: Child resistant custom cannabis pop tops perfectly proportioned for pre-rolls.
seo_description: Fully affordable customizable pre-roll pop tops for cannabis flower. Customization options including shape, size, color, labelling and printing.
first_description: Our pre roll packaging protects your goods by locking in freshness and keeping them at optimal potency. Designed to have a tight seal that keeps weed untouched, we offer the perfect option for a simple storage solution without the mess!
second_description: Available in black, white and a range of colors with screen printing and labelling options, our fully customizable pre-roll pop tops show off your brand at its best.
third_title: Easy and affordable way to package pre-rolls.
third_description: Pre Roll Pop Tops are an easy and affordable way to package pre-rolls. They maintain the integrity of each flower crumble so your customers can enjoy their product as intended, snap on tops keep it fresh, and our variety pack selections ensure you can find one that fits your needs.
